jcr:content.jcr:title: By Game Titles
jcr:content.seoDescription: Discover how Logitech G technology delivers a richer, more absorbing gameplay experience on major gaming titles.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G Advanced Gaming Gear for AAA Games

copyblock.mainDescription: Faster, sharper and smarter. Unlock your gaming potential and experience amazing new gameplay with advanced technology and design innovations from Logitech G.

We understand it’s hard to accept that wireless gaming gear can deliver the performance required to be viable. However, the reality is that LIGHTSPEED wireless technology is an uncompromised solution providing a super fast 1ms report rate with rock solid connectivity. With LIGHTSPEED, Logitech G has achieved wireless faster than wired making it the choice for all—from esports professionals to the first-time gamer.

Romer-G<sup>™</sup> switches are designed to be the most advanced and high performance mechanical keyswitch on the market. Both variants—tactile and linear—are faster, brighter and quieter than standard options. We made them more durable, shortened the actuation distance, obsessed over the keystroke experience and actuation point, optimized the RGB lighting, and made sure that they’re worthy of the Logitech G name.

Logitech G speakers and headsets have hidden superpowers. Not only is hybrid mesh woven into our Pro-G<sup>™</sup> audio drivers, virtual 7.1 surround sound creates a 3D soundscape all around you as well. With DTS<sup>®</sup> Headphone:X<sup>™</sup> you will clearly hear your friends’, foes’, and noisy loots’ position with lifelike, in-game spatial awareness.

image_banner.altText: Logitech Spark sample screen; League of Legends logo

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: It takes a lot of teams to deliver a superior gaming experience. It takes amazing software, too. Logitech G partners with the most popular game publishers and developers to elevate everything from the game to the gear. From automatic keybindings of unique in-game controls to Overwolf app integrations (like Spark that casts unique RGB lighting animations for League of Legends Champions’ abilities), we’re pushing the limits of play with all our partners.

copyblock.mainDescription: Logitech G, DICE and Lucas have collaborated together to design the official Star Wars™ Battlefront™ II gaming gear. Inspired by Inferno Squad, G810, G703, G933 and G840 have now completely turned to the dark side. These limited edition units are NOT for sale anywhere in the galaxy. Follow Logitech G social channels for once-in-a-lifetime gear giveaways like this.
copyblock.mainTitle: The Latest Addition to the Empire

copyblock.mainDescription: When your leading an interplanetary mission to establish a habitable colony light years away from home, you need gear you can rely on. For Mass Effect Andromeda, Logitech G teamed up with the creators at BioWare to develop a set of gear that’s straight out of a Pathfinder’s rig. Expect amazing gaming performance and experience with this immersive and fine-tuned set of Andromeda kit.

Strafe, angle, death from above ... stealth melee, run-and-gun, snipe. No matter how you slice it, the joy of FPS is about speed, timing, decisiveness and collaboration. Slice to the heart of Battlefield 1<sup>®</sup> with Romer-G switches, HERO sensor, and 1 ms LIGHTSPEED wireless—all designed for the millisecond, the nanometer, the one pixel of win required to defeat qualified adversaries.

Logitech G creates the most immersive Battlefield V experience. Your gear can be fully integrated with the game using Pro-G audio settings and custom in-game lighting effects with LIGHTSYNC RGB.

Better still, there’s limited edition Logitech G Official Battlefield V gaming gear. Get custom Battlefield V graphics on the outside. And all the extreme Logitech G technology on the inside. There's only one way to score this amazing gear: Follow @LogitechG.
copyblock.mainTitle: Gear Up and Join the Fight

media_tile.altText: LIGHTSYNC technology provides 16.8 million brilliant, programmable colors
media_tile.text: LIGHTSYNC technology immerses you into the action with automatic, game-driven lighting effects that react to many popular games. LIGHTSYNC also provides customizable animated lighting effects, dynamic screen sampling that extends monitor color, audio visualization and more.

media_tile_copy.text: Customize your Logitech G mouse, keyboard. headset and speakers for each game you play—even for each character you play, with Logitech Gaming Software (LGS). It’s packed with even more programmability, so create your custom lighting effects, build your craftiest macros and share your settings with all your friends.

media_tile_copy_873952307.text: Consistent, pixel-precise accuracy makes a critical difference in high-stakes competitive gameplay. HERO sensor is next-gen and the new leader in gaming performance. HERO features 400 IPS and zero smoothing, filtering or acceleration across the entire DPI range (200-16,000 DPI … that’s fast even at 8k). It’s the difference between a well-timed precision takedown and a one-pixel-off complete fail. That’s the pixel of win.
